problems.title: Not Charging / Lights Flashing
problems.description: Vacuum sits on dock but won't charge.
solution_steps: Wipe the charging pads on the dock and the unit.
If the adapter light doesn't turn on, replace the charger.

problems.title: Dirty Tank Full (False Alarm)
problems.description: Machine stops and indicates full tank when empty.
solution_steps: Dry the pleated filter for 24 hours.
Clean the float stack in the dirty tank lid.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a CrossWave Cordless Max (2554)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $587 vacuum, and extending the life of your Bissell is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my CrossWave Cordless Max (2554) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include intermittent power and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my CrossWave Cordless Max (2554) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
